TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 表示基于 Windows 域或用户帐户标识的安全令牌。

span.span: Represents a security token that is based on the identity of a Windows domain or user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，应用程序开发人员不需要使用 类，除非 Web 服务必须获取访问与 安全令牌关联的 Windows 域或用户帐户的详细信息的权限。Typically, application developers do not need to use the class, unless a Web service must gain access to details about the Windows domain or user account associated with the security token. 要获取 Windows 域或用户帐户的详细信息，请访问 属性。To get the details of the Windows domain or user account, access the property.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 后调用 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 方法后，必须释放对 的所有引用，这样垃圾收集器才能收回 占用的内存。After calling the method, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用之前，均应调用 方法。Always call the method before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 安全令牌的有效时间为 10 小时。A security token is valid for 10 hours, by default. 属性被设置为创建 类的时刻加上 10 小时。The property is set to the instant in time when the class is created plus 10 hours.
